name: Php-db-classes
tagline: Operation on Oracle database. Update, insert, delete. Present data in table form.
body:
### Welcome to just another PHP classes to work on MySQL.
It is my custom code to resolve in simple way access to database MySQL.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this code please write to me <karol@ultimasolution.pl>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
